entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:27 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -40.4°C

Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 12:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 42 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 42 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 60. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 45. Wind chill minus 61 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 39.
